data.description: Software Engineer InternLocation -- hybrid: Charlotte, NCAs a Software Engineer Intern at Intapp, you will be helping to build our world-class enterprise web applications. Our applications live in the cloud and provide AI-powered solutions to hundreds of the largest professional service firms in the world.   We are looking for extraordinary Software Engineering students who are ready to build creative applications that customers love. You will be directly embedded in our Scrum teams and will influence our products by helping to define innovative, user-focused features and help bring them to life. If you are ready to learn how to deliver results and are deeply technical and highly innovative, Intapp is the place for you.   What you will do:   As a member of a scrum team, you’ll design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and improve software   Manage project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables   Collaborate hand-in-hand with a skilled teams of software engineers   What you will need:    Junior or Senior pursuing a 4-year technical degree  High academic performance in Computer Science courses   Experience with modern programming languages   Commitment to teamwork and strong communication skills   Excited to solve technical problems   Bonus if you have:   C# .Net, React, Java or Python development experienceSQL.Postgress, Oracle database experienceCan easily thrive working in an energizing environment   Bias towards finding solutions vs. shutting down ideas   Detail-oriented and organized   Live within commuting distance of our office in Palo Alto, CAWhat to Expect:Our Summer 2026 Internship Program begins June 1, 2026, and is projected to end August 7, 2026.Your professional growth and development will be supported throughout the internship program via project work related to your academic and professional interests, mentorship, and engaging events with other interns and company leadership.Our internship is hybrid, and interns will be expected in the office at least 3 days a week to get the full experience of the Intapp culture and networking opportunities.Please visit Intapp Summer Internship to hear from our former interns about their internship experiences and check out Working at Intapp to learn more about what we value and why Intapp is a wonderful place to start your career!Intapp provides equal employment opportunities to all qualified applicants and will make hiring decisions without regard to race, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, religion, national origin or ancestry, age, disability, marital status, pregnancy, protected veteran status, protected genetic information, political affiliation, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws. Please note: Intapp will not hire through text message, social media, or email alone. We will never extend a job offer unless you have been contacted directly by an Intapp recruiter and have participated in the interview process which will generally consist of 3 or more virtual or in person meetings. Please note that Intapp only uses company email addresses, which contain “@intapp.com” or “@dealcloud.com” to communicate with candidates via email. Intapp will never ask for financial information of any kind or for any payment during the job application process. We post all legitimate job openings on the Intapp Career Site at https://www.intapp.com/working-at-intapp/. If you believe you were a victim of such a scam, you may contact your local authorities. Intapp is not responsible for any claims, losses, damages, or expenses resulting from scammers.
requirements: Junior or Senior pursuing a 4-year technical degree
responsibilities: As a member of a scrum team, you’ll design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and improve software
Collaborate hand-in-hand with a skilled teams of software engineers
C# .Net, React, Java or Python development experience

Your professional growth and development will be supported throughout the internship program via project work related to your academic and professional interests, mentorship, and engaging events with other interns and company leadership.
Our internship is hybrid, and interns will be expected in the office at least 3 days a week to get the full experience of the Intapp culture and networking opportunities.
